db:abstract.db:para: Encapsulate an environment light object in a Qt 3D scene.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: EnvironmentLight uses cubemaps to implement image-based lighting (IBL), a technique often used in conjunction with physically-based rendering (PBR). The cubemaps are typically expected be based on high dynamic range (HDR) images, with a suitable OpenGL format (such as RGBA16F) that can handle the increased range of values.

db:section.db:title: irradiance : Texture
db:section.db:para: Holds the current environment irradiance map texture.
By default, the environment irradiance texture is null.

db:note.db:para: The exact meaning and use of this property is up to the material implementation.

db:section.db:title: specular : Texture
db:section.db:para: Holds the current environment specular map texture.
By default, the environment specular texture is null.

db:note.db:para: The exact meaning and use of this property is up to the material implementation.
